title: A Drop in the bucket
creator_credit: Joseph Henabery, United States. Public Health Service and Warner-Pathe News
brief_description: Dramatised story of how dentists, civic leaders, health officials, and people of a town agreed to add fluoride to the community water supply. Explains how the fluoride is added, the cost of fluoridation, and the benefits accruing to the community.
